DataElement.preferredDefinition: Free-text field to provide another reason for the inadequate condition of a specimen.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis._A state of being, such as a state of health._Not meeting a quantitative or qualitative measure necessary for a requirement._An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.:A state of being, such as a state of health.

Concepts.definition: A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.
A state of being, such as a state of health.

Property.preferredDefinition: Not meeting a quantitative or qualitative measure necessary for a requirement.:An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

Concepts.definition: Not meeting a quantitative or qualitative measure necessary for a requirement.
An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: attributes of a patient's laboratory sample, including the source, condition, and fixative.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 5-5-20 tmt released per MM. 12/6/19 tmt created for Seed Study.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The free text field that describes another response when other is chosen from a list of values.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Not otherwise specified.:Specify; be specific about something; define clearly.:Text; the words of something written.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
Be specific about something; define clearly.
